short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension replaces your Google Chrome "new tab" page with a list of links you get to customize.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Today, Google Chrome's default "new tab" page does not let you fully customize its set of links, and is limited in other ways.

This "New Tab Page" Chrome extension gives you control of exactly which links show up on your "new tab" page.

When you install this extension, Chrome will ask "Is this the new tab you were expecting?" Select "Keep changes". This lets the extension replace the default "new tab" page.
